Description: Completely Renovated 4 bedroom, 2 bath (approx. 1800+ Sq Ft) with In Unit Laundry. Two-Level living (2nd and 3rd floor). 2 parking, with 1 being Garage Parking is included in the rent. Eat In Kitchen with granite counter tops, new stainless steel appliances that includes Dishwasher, Disposal, and Microwave. Free IN UNIT Laundry. Large front Porch, and New Hardwood Floors Throughout. Located in Brighton's Oak Square, close to Shops, Restaurants, and YMCA. Minutes to Mass Turnpike and Storrow Drive. Bus Stop steps from house: Express Bus 501 & 503 to Downtown Boston & Copley Square, Bus 57: Kenmore/BU University, Bus 64 Kendall Square/MIT, Bus 65: Kenmore Station, Bus 68: Harvard Square/Harvard University. Upfront Cost = Rent x 4: First, Last, and Security and Fee required.... but may consider collecting only Rent X3 (First Security and Fee) with good credit and references. No Pets Allowed (RLNE8171428)
